Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Greg Beeman', 'Olatunde Osunsanmi', 'Sergio Mimica-Gezzan', 'Adam Kane', 'Jonathan Frakes', 'David Solomon', 'Holly Dale', 'Frederick E.O. Toye', 'Carl Franklin', 'Anthony Hemingway'], 'Starring': ['Noah Wyle', 'Moon Bloodgood', 'Will Patton']}
Review Text: How I missed this series for two years is beyond me, and I really have to thank Amazon Prime because I would have never known about it without them.  Earth has been invaded by aliens and they are attempting to destroy our race and enslave our children.  Hands down the best Sci-Fi series I've seen since Lost.  The characters are amazing enough that even those that don't like the action in a series, will fall in love with it because of the underlying human drama element. I watched the entire two years in less than two weeks if that tells you how blown away I was by this series.
Review Title: Falling Skies is Phenomenal
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Review Text: This show is absolutely amazing, and my only regret is I just found it in 2012.  The characters are incredible, the plot will blow your mind and it will definitely leave you wanting to see the next season and the next and the next!  Conspiracy theory folks, Sci-Fi or simple people who just love a good love story will all enjoy this show.  It actually made me start researching science again!  Don't miss out on Fringe!

Zanuck', 'David Brown'], 'Starring': ['Roy Scheider', 'Robert Shaw', 'Richard Dreyfuss'], 'Studio': ['UNIVERSAL PAY TELEVISION']}
Review Text: Picked this up to watch to christen our new pool and movie night on the big screen.  It was almost nostalagic watching the original Jaws again!  All I can say is pick it up and watch it again.
Review Title: Can't Go Wrong With A Classic
Rating: 5.0

Review Date: 2019/04/10
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Juan Carlos Medina', 'Alice Troughton', 'Sarah Walker'], 'Producers': ['Deborah Harkness', 'Lachlan MacKinnon'], 'Starring': ['Matthew Goode', 'Teresa Palmer', 'Valarie Pettiford']}
Review Text: The Discovery of Witches has held me in it's thrall from the first episode.  This is an adult version (and I don't mean for graphic situations but intellect) of fantasy which may not appeal to the younger generation because the scenes follow more realism than fairy tale.  This is like the classic representation of lore, instead of the trendier angst we find in other types of paranormal shows.  Having said that, there are variations with the creatures which make it very unique.  If you're looking for teenage cliches this isn't for you, but if you have a inquisitive mind, and love well thought out scenarios, you'll be captivated.
Review Title: A Must Watch Series for Lovers of the Paranormal
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
**Summary of Preferences and Patterns:**

- **Genre Inclination**: Strong preference for science fiction and fantasy, often highlighting unique plots and deep character development.
- **High Ratings**: Consistently rates products highly (4.6 to 5.0), indicating strong satisfaction with choices.
- **Binge-Watching Behavior**: Demonstrates a tendency to binge-watch series, frequently completing multiple seasons in short timeframes.
- **Emotional Engagement**: Reviews frequently mention emotional connections to characters, indicating an appreciation for character-driven stories alongside action and plot complexity.
- **Interest in Nuanced Themes**: Enjoys series with elements of conspiracy, fringe science, and darker, more mature themes.
- **Historical and Supernatural Elements**: Shows a recurring interest in blending historical context with fantastical or supernatural themes.
- **Positive Nostalgia**: Expresses nostalgic appreciation of classic films, suggesting a comfort with familiar, high-quality storytelling.
- **Reviewer Enthusiasm**: Language in reviews exhibits passion and excitement, suggesting that entertainment plays a significant role in lifestyle.

Overall, this individual exhibits a discerning taste for engaging narratives within the sci-fi and fantasy genres, marked by emotional depth and a penchant for binge-watching high-quality series.

target_interaction.title: Awareness is Key
target_interaction.text: While the information is disturbing, it's imperative that we all become aware of what's going on in our world.  The best way to help is to be aware!  This is a global issue and together we can all change the outcome.  Take the time to watch this and please go volunteer with O.U.R.  I did after watching!
